DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , multiple-dose , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study ass safety PK oseltamivir ( Tamiflu ) carboxylate metabolite , RO0640802 healthy participant . Participants randomize receive 100 milligram ( mg ) oseltamivir , 200 mg oseltamivir , placebo , administer intravenously twice daily ( BID ) . The anticipated time study treatment 5 day .
